turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm looking to order some pizza from a pizzeria called Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like Well, I would like four large pizzas. One of them, I would like just butter. A lot of butter on the first pizza. On the second pizza, I would like a bunch of shrimp. On the third pizza, I would like a bunch of crab. And on the last pizza, let's go with lobster.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, bella luna's doesn't have crab but they do have shrimp and lobster.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. So, I still need four pizzas. So, on the last pizza, can I get how about just regular pepperoni?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, and for the butter pizza did you want butter sauce?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wow. Yeah, definitely. Of course.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you are ordering 4 large pizzas, one with butter sauce and cheese, 1 shrimp, 1 lobster, and 1 pepperoni, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. And if you wouldn't mind, can you make all of them thin crust, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i'll add that to the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $96, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Are you guys running a special? Can I add in a coupon?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i can check to see if they have any coupons for you, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it looks like you can add a side for free.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cool. Can I get a side of fries, then?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can add that to your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine-in, pick up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to pick it up, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your order will be ready in 45 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much.
